name: Garbanzo Beans Curry
description: This Everyday Chole, garbanzo beans curry is easy, delicious and packed full of goodness. Vegan, Gluten Free recipe.
recipeIngredient: Chopped onion (cilantro and lime juice for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook the garbanzo beans with a cup of water, tea bag, cloves, cardamom and bay leaf and cinnamon for about 2 whistles or till the beans are very soft and easily mash-able.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook the garbanzo beans with a cup of water, tea bag, cloves, cardamom and bay leaf and cinnamon for about 2 whistles or till the beans are very soft and easily mash-able.

recipeInstructions.text: Discard the tea bag, cloves, cardamom and bay leaf. Mash some of the beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Discard the tea bag, cloves, cardamom and bay leaf. Mash some of the beans.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the oil at medium heat and add hing(asafetida), chopped onions and Serrano chili pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the oil at medium heat and add hing(asafetida), chopped onions and Serrano chili pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until the onion starts to get soft and golden .
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until the onion starts to get soft and golden .

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spices( cumin , coriander, turmeric) , ginger and garlic and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spices( cumin , coriander, turmeric) , ginger and garlic and cook for another 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the tomatoes and salt and cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the tomatoes and salt and cook for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cooked garbanzo beans and mix well. Check for salt and spice. Add more salt or red chili powder if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cooked garbanzo beans and mix well. Check for salt and spice. Add more salt or red chili powder if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on medium low heat, covered for 10-15 minutes or until the gravy thickens to a consistency you like.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on medium low heat, covered for 10-15 minutes or until the gravy thickens to a consistency you like.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot and Garnish with chopped onions, cilantro and lime juice !
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot and Garnish with chopped onions, cilantro and lime juice !

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy with Puri, Naan, Roti or Basmati Rice!
recipeInstructions.name: Enjoy with Puri, Naan, Roti or Basmati Rice!

keywords: bean curry, easy curry recipe, vegan curry
